description: This file defines the AttributesReadRequest class, which models a request to read attributes from a mock Zigbee device in a testing environment. It includes methods for executing the request by interacting with device endpoints and clusters.

classes.name: AttributesReadRequest
classes.description: Represents a request to read attributes from a Zigbee device, including the logic to execute the request against a mock device simulation.

methods.name: AttributesReadRequest
methods.description: Constructor to initialize a new attribute read request with device and attribute details.

methods.name: executeDeviceRequest
methods.description: Executes the attribute read request on a specified mock Zigbee device, retrieving attribute data.
